verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and spoke <S%G3004><s%> to them again <S%G3825><s%> in parables, <S%G3850><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> may be compared <S%G3666><s%> to a king, <S%G444><s%> <S%G935><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> gave <S%G4160><s%> a wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast <S%G1062><s%> for his son. <S%G5207><s%>

"And he sent <S%G649><s%> out his slaves <S%G1401><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had been invited <S%G2564><s%> to the wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast, <S%G1062><s%> and they were unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to come. <S%G2064><s%>

"Again <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> out other <S%G243><s%> slaves <S%G1401><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Tell <S%G3004><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who have been invited, <S%G2564><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have prepared <S%G2090><s%> my dinner; <S%G712><s%> my oxen <S%G5022><s%> and my fattened <S%G4619><s%> livestock <S%G4619><s%> are [all] butchered <S%G2380><s%> and everything <S%G3956><s%> is ready; <S%G2092><s%> come <S%G1205><s%> to the wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast. <S%G1062><s%> "'

"But they paid <S%G272><s%> no <S%G272><s%> attention <S%G272><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> their way, <S%G565><s%> one <S%G3739><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> farm, <S%G68><s%> another <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> to his business, <S%G1171><s%>
and the rest <S%G3062><s%> seized <S%G2902><s%> his slaves <S%G1401><s%> and mistreated <S%G5195><s%> them and killed <S%G615><s%> them.

"But the king <S%G935><s%> was enraged <S%G3710><s%> and sent <S%G3992><s%> his armies, <S%G4753><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> murderers, <S%G5406><s%> and set <S%G7066><s%> their city <S%G4172><s%> on fire. <S%G7066><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to his slaves, <S%G1401><s%> 'The wedding <S%G1062><s%> is ready, <S%G2092><s%> but those <S%G3588><s%> who were invited <S%G2564><s%> were not worthy. <S%G514><s%>

'Go <S%G4198><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to the main <S%G1327><s%> highways, <S%G3598><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as you find <S%G2147><s%> [there,] invite <S%G2564><s%> to the wedding <S%G1062><s%> feast. <S%G1062><s%>'

"And those <S%G1565><s%> slaves <S%G1401><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out into the streets, <S%G3598><s%> and gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they found, <S%G2147><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> and good; <S%G18><s%> and the wedding <S%G3567><s%> hall <S%G3567><s%> was filled <S%G4092><s%> with dinner <S%G345><s%> guests. <S%G345><s%>

"But when the king <S%G935><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in to look <S%G2300><s%> over <S%G2300><s%> the dinner <S%G345><s%> guests, <S%G345><s%> he saw <S%G3708><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> not dressed <S%G1746><s%> in wedding <S%G1062><s%> clothes, <S%G1742><s%>

and he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Friend, <S%G2083><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> did you come <S%G1525><s%> in here <S%G5602><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> wedding <S%G1062><s%> clothes <S%G1742><s%>?' And he was speechless. <S%G5392><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the servants, <S%G1249><s%> 'Bind <S%G1210><s%> him hand <S%G5495><s%> and foot, <S%G4228><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> him into the outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness; <S%G4655><s%> in that place <S%G1563><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>'
"For many <S%G4183><s%> are called, <S%G2822><s%> but few <S%G3641><s%> [are] chosen. <S%G1588><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and counseled <S%G4824><s%> <S%G2983><s%> together <S%G4824><s%> how <S%G3704><s%> they might trap <S%G3802><s%> Him in what He said. <S%G3056><s%>

And they sent <S%G649><s%> their disciples <S%G3101><s%> to Him, along with the Herodians, <S%G2265><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that You are truthful <S%G227><s%> and teach <S%G1321><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth, <S%G225><s%> and defer <S%G3199><s%> to no <S%G3762><s%> one; <S%G3762><s%> for You are not partial <S%G991><s%> <S%G4383><s%> to any. <S%G3762><s%>

"Tell <S%G3004><s%> us therefore, <S%G3767><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> do You think <S%G1380><s%>? Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> a poll-tax to Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> not?"
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived <S%G1097><s%> their malice, <S%G4189><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you testing <S%G3985><s%> Me, you hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>?
"Show <S%G1925><s%> Me the coin <S%G3546><s%> [used] for the poll-tax." And they brought <S%G4374><s%> Him a denarius. <S%G1220><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Whose <S%G5101><s%> likeness <S%G1504><s%> and inscription <S%G1923><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%>?"

They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Caesar <S%G2541><s%>'s." Then <S%G5119><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Then <S%G3767><s%> render <S%G591><s%> to Caesar the things that are Caesar's; and to God <S%G2316><s%> the things that are God's."
And hearing <S%G191><s%> [this,] they marveled, <S%G2296><s%> and leaving <S%G863><s%> Him, they went <S%G565><s%> away. <S%G565><s%>
On that day <S%G2250><s%> [some] Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> (who say <S%G3004><s%> there is no <S%G3361><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>) came <S%G4334><s%> to Him and questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him,

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> 'If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> dies, <S%G599><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> as next of kin shall marry <S%G1918><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> and raise <S%G450><s%> up an offspring <S%G4690><s%> to his brother. <S%G80><s%>'

"Now <S%G1161><s%> there were seven <S%G2033><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> with us; and the first <S%G4413><s%> married <S%G1060><s%> and died, <S%G5053><s%> and having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> offspring <S%G4690><s%> left <S%G863><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> to his brother; <S%G80><s%>
so <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the second, <S%G1208><s%> and the third, <S%G5154><s%> down <S%G2193><s%> to the seventh. <S%G2033><s%>
"And last <S%G5305><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>
"In the resurrection <S%G386><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> shall she be? For they all <S%G3956><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> her."

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You are mistaken, <S%G4105><s%> not understanding <S%G3609><s%> the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

"For in the resurrection <S%G386><s%> they neither <S%G3777><s%> marry, <S%G1060><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> are given <S%G7031><s%> in marriage, <S%G7031><s%> but are like <S%G5613><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"But regarding <S%G4012><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> that which was spoken <S%G3004><s%> to you by God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

'I am <S%G1510><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob <S%G2384><s%>'? He is not the God <S%G2316><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> but of the living. <S%G2198><s%> "
And when the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at His teaching. <S%G1322><s%>

But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that He had put <S%G5392><s%> the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> to silence, <S%G5392><s%> they gathered <S%G4863><s%> themselves together <S%G1909><s%>. <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%>
And one <S%G1520><s%> of them, a lawyer, <S%G3544><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> Him [a question,] testing <S%G3985><s%> Him,
"Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> which <S%G4169><s%> is the great <S%G3173><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> in the Law <S%G3551><s%>?"

And He said <S%G5346><s%> to him, " 'You shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind. <S%G1271><s%>'
"This <S%G3778><s%> is the great <S%G3173><s%> and foremost <S%G4413><s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>
"The second <S%G1208><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> it, 'You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>'
"On these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> depend <S%G2910><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> and the Prophets. <S%G4396><s%>"
Now <S%G1161><s%> while the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> them a question, <S%G1905><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you think <S%G1380><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> is He?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "[The son] of David. <S%G7035><s%>"
He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Then <S%G3767><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> does David <S%G7035><s%> in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> call <S%G2564><s%> Him 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' saying, <S%G3004><s%>

'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Sit <S%G2521><s%> at My right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G1188><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> I put <S%G5087><s%> Thine <S%G4771><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> beneath <S%G5270><s%> Thy feet <S%G4228><s%>"'?
" If <S%G1487><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> calls <S%G2564><s%> Him 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' how <S%G4459><s%> is He his son <S%G5207><s%>?"

And no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> Him a word, <S%G3056><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> did anyone <S%G5100><s%> dare <S%G5111><s%> from that day <S%G2250><s%> on to ask <S%G1905><s%> Him another <S%G3765><s%> question. <S%G1905><s%>
